title: Kaiserhuettn
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, German, Austrian
description: Opened Feb 2015, this little cafe serves vegan Kaiserschmarrn and other food and beverages from Austria and Bavaria, including fair trade coffee and infusions. Alpine atmosphere. Operates another outlet at the Muensterplatz Bonn near the main entrance of Galeria Kaufhof department store Monday-Saturday.
